login.title: Welcome to the FIRST Lego League scoring system
login.description:
Enter a username and a password to log in.
If you don't have this information, your tournament organizer or head referee can find it in the "FIRST Lego League Scoring" software window, by clicking the link "Passwords".

errors.noCallbackUrl: No callback URL provided. This is a bug with one of the SPs, please contact your system admin.
errors.userNotFound: We couldn't find that user... Can you try again?
errors.passwordIncorrect: This password was incorrect... please try again
